directions: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add oil. Add beef tenderloin, pepper and salt. Mix together. Allow to cook for a few minutes. Add onions, peppers and garlic and stir. Mix in steak sauce, brown sugar, hot sauce and dry mustard. Cook until browned.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons steak sauce (preferred: A1 Steak Sauce)
title: Big Daddy's Sloppy Joe Burgers
